name: Sunday Law'd for PLAYDATE reel 1, 2, and 3! Full game!
name_original: Sunday Law'd for PLAYDATE reel 1, 2, and 3! Full game!
description:
Alright! First playdate full game. It's reel 1, 2, and 3!!! a 3 Reeler!

Cranking SLOW at times is the key to playing this game...as it plays out as an old film, you can change the reels by slowing down cranks (just waiting) until a different outcome happens! Sometimes audible notes are clues but other times it trying waiting on different frames.

Sunday Lawd playdate console game reel 1 - YouTube

You go back in an alternative universe and find the 1888 national Sunday bill (blue laws) did in fact pass, and now  your freedom is restricted. What to do?  Will you continue to  play the accordion for money? Will you get a pet monkey? Will you wind up on the bumper cars of death? Is love in the air? 

Try before you buy get reel 1 here:

Sunday Lawd REEL 1 for PLAYDATE by Game portal.... (itch.io)
